pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, January 20, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, January 20, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Federation of Canadian Municipalities' Big City Mayors’ Caucus.

Adam Room 
Château Laurier
1 Rideau Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.
